t: General Pencil Company, Inc. – Inspiring Creative Expression Starting with a Pencil

t: General Pencil - Art Supply Brands | Jerry's Artarama
s: General Pencil Company is a family-owned business. It has been owned and operated by the Weissenborn family since 1889. General Pencil continues to handcraft its pencils using sustained yield California Incense Cedarwood in Jersey City, USA.
